Robert "Shea" Taylor bụ onye na-ede egwu, 
ónyé na-emepụta ihe, ónyé na'ọtụtụ ngwá egwu nke bi na New York City
O guzobere mmekọrịta na-aga nke ọma na-ede egwu na ónyé na-agụ egwu R&B nke Def Jam bụ Ne-Yo, ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Rihanna, Beyoncé, Ariana Grande, Janet Jackson, Chris Brown, na Wyclef Jean.

Taylor nwèrè ihe odide egwu na egwu asaá site na album studio nke anọ nke Beyonce, 4 (2011). Abọm ahụ bụ ihe ịga nke ọma azụmahịa; na-enweta asambodo platinum na US, ma na-amalite n'elu chaatị US Billboard 200, na ahịa izu mbụ nke ihe karịrị 300,000. "Love on Top" bu n'elu US Hot R&B / Hip-Hop Songs chart na Adult R&B Airplay chart na March 2012. "Run the World (Girls)" ruru nọmba otu na US Hot Dance Club Songs ma bụrụ Gold na US na New Zealand, yana Platinum na Australia na Canada. "Best Thing I Never Had" rịgooro n'elu chaatị ikuku nke Nielsen Urban na Septemba wee ruo n'ọkwa nké anọ na chaatị Hot R&B / Hip-Hop Songs.

Taylor so dee egwu "Thinkin Bout You" na "Pilot Jones" na Frank Ocean's debut studio album Channel Orange (2012). Abọm ahụ malitere n'elu na chaatị US Billboard R&B / Hip-Hop Albums na nọmba abụọ na chaatụ UK R&B Albums. Ọ malitekwara na ọnụọgụ abụọ na Billboard 200.
